settings.heading: We Will Do Anything For Their Wellness From Nose To Tail.

settings.text: Transform the Health of Your Beloved Pets: Unlock the Secrets to Optimal Well-being for Your Dogs and Cats through Personalized Online Pet Consulting Service

Dr. Ruth Roberts’ team of highly trained and certified holistic pet health consultants is here to help you. Book a consultation today and embark on a personalized journey toward improving your beloved dog’s and cat’s quality of life under the guidance of Dr. Ruth Roberts.

settings.title: Expertise
settings.text: Our pet consultants have undergone rigorous training in holistic pet care by Dr. Ruth Roberts, equipping them with in-depth knowledge and practical skills to address a wide range of health concerns for dogs and cats.

settings.title: Holistic Approach
settings.text: We believe in treating pets as whole beings, considering their physical, emotional, and nutritional needs. Our coaches specialize in holistic approaches that emphasize natural remedies and balanced lifestyles.

settings.title: Personalized Care
settings.text: Each consultation is tailored to your pet's unique needs. Our coaches will listen attentively to your concerns, conduct thorough assessments, and provide customized recommendations to support your pet's well-being.

settings.title: Comprehensive Services
settings.text: Our pet consultants can assist you with various aspects of pet health, including nutrition advice, behavior modification, exercise plans, and preventive care strategies. Whatever your pet's needs may be, we're here to help.

settings.title: Practical Recommendations
settings.text: You'll receive clear and actionable recommendations to address your pet's health concerns, enhance their behavior, or improve their overall quality of life.

settings.title: 1-Select a Pet Consultant
settings.detail: Browse through our team of dedicated petconsultants and select the one who best fits your needs. Each consultant brings a unique skill set, experience, and specialization in holistic pet care. Take into account their expertise and areas of focus to find the perfect match for your pet's specific requirements.
settings.detail_1: Once you've chosen your preferred consultant, it's time to book a consultation. Utilize our convenient booking system or contact our team directly to schedule an appointment with your selected consultant. This step ensures that you have dedicated time to discuss your pet's situation and work collaboratively towards their well-being.
settings.detail_2: During the consultation, your chosen pet consultant will conduct a thorough assessment of your dog’s or cat’s situation. They will actively listen to your concerns, ask relevant questions, and gather information about your pet's health, behavior, and lifestyle. This comprehensive evaluation forms the basis for creating a personalized care plan.

settings.detail_r: Based on the assessment, your consultant will develop a personalized care plan tailored to your pet's specific needs. The care plan will encompass recommendations and interventions designed to address your dog’s or cat’s health concerns and enhance their overall well-being.
settings.detail_r_2: With the personalized care plan in hand, it's time to put it into action. Your consultant will guide you through the implementation process, providing clear instructions and practical guidance. They will help you make necessary adjustments to your pet's diet, exercise routine, and other aspects of their care. This collaborative effort ensures a seamless integration of the care plan into your pet's daily life.
settings.detail_r_3: We understand that ongoing support is crucial for the success of your pet's well-being. Your consultant will be available to provide continuous support and guidance. They will address any questions, concerns, or challenges you may have along the way. Regular check-ins and follow-up consultations will allow for monitoring progress, making adjustments to the pet care plan, and providing ongoing support.

settings.heading: Our Collaboration Approach
settings.desc: Embrace the amazing benefits of collaboration as we work together to enhance your pet's well-being.

settings.title: Wilma Shaw
settings.detail: After a fulfilling career as a Systems Engineer, Wilma Shaw found her true passion in helping people and pets achieve their best health. Since 2016, she has operated her Embrace Nutrition practice, providing personalized 1:1 and group classes to hundreds of individuals. With her expertise, Wilma will support your dog or cat's optimal health by helping you understand veterinary recommendations and addressing underlying causes of symptoms or dis-ease. She offers both in-person and virtual consultations for client convenience.

settings.title: Mind Blowing!
settings.name: Missy Springer & Kenzie South Paw Aussies
settings.message: Michael became Kenzie’s health coach last September. She was itching so much I had to put her on Apoquel. Michael guided us thru making the crock pot diet, choosing the right proteins and getting the correct supplements in her diet. Within a week her itching lessened and she came off the Apoquel. I don’t think I would have been brave enough to venture into cooking for her without Michael’s help. Missy Springer SouthPaw Aussies

settings.title: Mind Blowing!
settings.name: Amanda Delgado
settings.message: I really enjoyed connecting with Dlorah who is a recent graduate of Dr. Roberts holistic pet health coach program. I found it helpful to hear all about her experience with the course and what she found useful in her journey to become a certified pet health coach. It was great to connect with someone who has a similar educational background and experiences. To me, at the beginning, I was feeling hesitant and having doubts if this was the right path, but the onboarding call just reconfirmed for me that it absolutely is

settings.title: Mind Blowing!
settings.name: Lori Schmidt
settings.message: Dlorah was very helpful and I am happy to have her as my mentor. She walked me through the homework, answered my questions, shared her screen to show me how to get to the information that I had not been able to find. The pet consultation was informative and she had good suggestions on additional things to do for my dog. It was interesting to learn that he is a metal type dog, I looked up information on a metal dog and it fits his personality well.

settings.heading: our client’s Testimonials
settings.desc: Hear the Feedback from Our Valued Clients on Our Consultations.

settings.text: Are you passionate about the well-being of animals? Do you believe in the power of holistic approaches to pet health? If so, we invite you to join our team as a Certified Holistic Pet Health Coach. By becoming a part of our dedicated group of professionals, you can make a significant impact in the lives of pets and their owners, helping them achieve optimal health and happiness.
